sentences.en: Generosity is its own form of power.
He treated them with generosity and thoughtfulness.
sentences.cn: 他待他们宽容大度、体贴周到。

sentences.en: His generosity is one of his good traits.
sentences.cn: 慷慨大方是他的好品质之一.

sentences.en: His patriarchal generosity is counter-balanced by his ruthlessness.
sentences.cn: 他有着族长式的慷慨大方，同时却又冷漠无情。

sentences.en: How can we match our generosity against theirs?
sentences.cn: 我们怎么能和他们的慷慨大方相比 呢 ?

sentences.en: I appreciate your generosity in the matter.
sentences.cn: 我很欣赏你在这件事上表现出来的宽大胸怀.

sentences.en: I felt guilty saying that, playing on her generosity.
sentences.cn: 我说这话是利用了她的慷慨，对此我感到愧疚。

sentences.en: I shall never forget the generosity shownby the people of Bastaisk.
sentences.cn: 我永远也不会忘记巴斯泰斯克人的慷慨大方。

sentences.en: I wonder why you can't credit him with the same generosity of spirit.
sentences.cn: 我想知道你为什么不认为他具有同样崇高的思想境界。
尼赫鲁以他一贯的大度之风作了回答。

sentences.en: There are stories about his generosity, the massive amounts of money he gave to charities.
sentences.cn: 有传闻说他向慈善机构慷慨解囊，捐献巨款。

sentences.en: These charities depend on the compassionate feelings and generosity of the general public.
sentences.cn: 这些慈善团体依赖于公众的怜悯之心和慷慨解囊。

sentences.en: We adore them for their generosity.
We should match their generosity with our own.
sentences.cn: 我们应该像他们一样慷慨大方.

sentences.en: We were completely knocked out by their generosity.
sentences.cn: 他们的宽宏大量使我们感到十分吃惊.

sentences.en: You'll take everything you're offered yet your own generosity is virtually non-existent.
sentences.cn: 你倒是来者不拒，照单全收，可你自己实际上却一毛不拔。

words.tran_cn: 慷慨的，大方的；宽宏大量的；有雅量的

trans.tran_cn: 慷慨，大方，宽容或慷慨的行为，丰富
trans.tran_en: a generous attitude, or generous behaviour
